IRing

END_NAMESPACE_GIS_GEOMETRY BEGIN_NAMESPACE_GIS_GEOMETRY public __gc __interface IRing
 

The GisIRing class is ring Geometry helper type. This is the most general non-abstract ring type. GisIRing is defined by an ordered collection of contiguous curve segments.
